column2: Crescent Point Energy Corp. engages in the exploration, development, and production of oil and gas properties. The company is headquartered in Calgary, Alberta and currently employs 0 full-time employees. The firm is an oil and gas producer with assets consisting of light and medium oil and natural gas reserves in Western Canada and the United States. Its crude oil and natural gas properties and related assets are located in the provinces of Alberta, British Columbia and Manitoba, and the states of North Dakota, Montana, Colorado and Utah. The firm holds a portfolio of assets in the Canadian portion of the Williston Basin. The company holds interest in the Bakken and Torquay resource plays in the Canadian portion of the Williston Basin.
